title: Doc: a custom connector must be implement the Clone trait
refactor(server): remove Unpin requirement from the Body generic
docs(client): show how to implement a Connector
feat(body): add `body::aggregate` and `body::to_bytes` functions
body:
Adds utility functions to `hyper::body` to help asynchronously
collecting all the buffers of some `HttpBody` into one.

- `aggregate` will collect all into an `impl Buf` without copying the
  contents. This is ideal if you don't need a contiguous buffer.
- `to_bytes` will copy all the data into a single contiguous `Bytes`
  buffer.

title: feat(body): replace `Chunk` type with `Bytes`
body:
Closes #1931

BREAKING CHANGE: All usage of `hyper::Chunk` should be replaced with
  `bytes::Bytes` (or `hyper::body::Bytes`).

title: style(lib): run rustfmt and enforce in CI
GitHub Actions: Name steps and use matrix.include for features etc.
body:
I added `fail-fast: false` because i've seen random failures on windows and macOS for tests.
- `client::pool::tests::test_pool_timer_removes_expired`
- `client::connect::http::tests::client_happy_eyeballs`

title: Rename `unstable-stream` feature to `stream` and enable by default
refactor(client): return HttpConnecting newtype
body: We return this `Future` instead of the `Pin<Box<dyn Future>>` directly so that users don't rely on it fitting in a `Pin<Box<dyn Future>>` slot (and thus we can change the type in the future).

title: feat(client): remove `Destination` for `http::Uri` in connectors
body: This changes "connectors" to be called with a `Uri` instead of `Destination`. The `Destination` type wasn't providing anything extra over an `http::Uri`.

title: feat(body): replace the `Payload` trait with `HttpBody`
body:
The `hyper::body::HttpBody` trait is a re-export from the `http-body`
crate. This allows libraries to accept "HTTP bodies" without needing to
depend on hyper.

BREAKING CHANGE: All usage of `hyper::body::Payload` should be replaced
  with `hyper::body::HttpBody`.

title: feat(rt): introduce `rt::Executor` trait
body:
The `hyper::rt::Executor` trait allows defining custom executors to be
used with hyper's `Client` and `Server`.

Closes #1944

BREAKING CHANGE: Any type passed to the `executor` builder methods must
  now implement `hyper::rt::Executor`.

  `hyper::rt::spawn` usage should be replaced with `tokio::task::spawn`.

  `hyper::rt::run` usage should be replaced with `#[tokio::main]` or
  managing a `tokio::runtime::Runtime` manually.

title: chore(dependencies): update tower-service to 0.3
body: This unblocks some work that I'm doing in `tracing` where I'm updating `tracing-tower` to the versions that use `std::future::Future`.

title: Update Tokio, bytes, http, h2, and http-body
Give `Server::local_addr` a more general type
body: Allows `local_addr` to work for any executor type, rather than just the default `Exec`. The underlying `SpawnAll::local_addr()` is already similarly general, so no other changes are needed other than adding the extra type parameter to the `impl`.
